name: Candy Merge (itch)
description:
Match three or more candy pieces of the same type to merge them into a single, upgraded candy. Merge your way through seven candy types, then line up three top-level pieces to destroy all of the candies in the surrounding area!

Earn a power-up candy for every top-level merge, and drop one on the board to instantly clear a 3x3 grid, a full row, a full column, or a full row AND column at the same time!

GAMEPLAY

Press and hold candy pieces to drag them over a square on the game board, and lift your finger to drop them into place. Tap double pieces to rotate them. That's it! Carefully plan your drops to trigger chain merges. Merge top-level candies to earn power-ups and extend your game!

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screen within the game.

FEATURES

  • Endless play with no time limits!
  • Four earnable power-up types!
  • Simple, elegant game board and candy design!
  • Intuitive touch-screen controls!
  • Catchy background music!
  • Fun particle effects!
  • Suitable for players of all ages!
